p: In 2003–2004, we performed serosurveys of equids in selected areas of the States of Tamaulipas, Veracruz, and Tabasco, as previously described [17]. In 2008–2010, a more focused study was performed in the State of Veracruz, where we tested for VEEV antibodies in a variety of vertebrates, including equids, bovids, canids, rodents and humans. We also isolated and sequenced viruses from sentinel hamsters and mosquitoes in this area ( Table 1).
